title: The Management API
description:
The Management API provides access to the Google Analytics configuration data for an authorized user. With this API you can:
List all the Account, Property and View (Profile) information for a user.Manage Properties, Views (Profiles), and Goals.Manage user permissions for an account hierarchy.Retrieve a View (Profile) ID to use with the Core Reporting API.Determine which goals are active and access their configured names.Retrieve a user's Custom Segments to apply them to Core Reporting API queries.
Upload cost data to Google Analytics for non-Google paid campaigns.Manage Content Experiments.
